title: 'Review of purchase of shorts'
body: 'Product is very good and very comfortable to wear. But one thing the product tag shows it is 30 whereas actually it is 32 inches. So I have to size it for my waist to 30inches. The seller must take note of this for future reference.'

title: 'Order one size larger than your usual.'
body: Well, first things first: the shorts are of good quality and quite comfortable. The only thing I'd like to advise is, order one size above what you usually wear. I always wear size 36 and I ordered accordingly. But, when I tried it on, it was a very tight fit. Hence, I decided to get it replaced with a larger size i.e size 38. It was an almost perfect fit.
